name: Nugget
description:
This place is filled with death. But hope is not lost, an egg was born, alive! Wait, was it an egg or a chicken first?

Turn your egg into a chick into a chicken into an egg into a chick into… well you get the idea, and escape this slaughterhouse without being turned into nuggets!

CONTROLS:

  • Jump (Chick and Chicken) / Slowdown (Egg) : Space / Left Click / Gamepad B
  • Evolve: Return / Right Click / Gamepad A
